title: Looking for gril to play ranked with. Silver/gold
body: With for 4 people and need a 5th. Add the 1 eyed moose

replies.body: Down to carry. I also bbq for free.
hey i'm totes a gril, my name is Kevina, i'd love to play with you for only 1000 RP per hour!
I can never tell if these are trollposts or not.
